title: ClearHead Core Configuration
description: Core configuration schema for ClearHead implementations. Implementations may extend this schema with their own namespaced settings (e.g., cli_*, nvim_*, web_*).

data_dir.description: Global directory for user data and action files. Supports shell expansion (~, $HOME, etc.)

config_dir.description: Global directory for configuration files. Supports shell expansion (~, $HOME, etc.)

default_file.description: Default action file name. Can be relative (resolved from data_dir) or absolute.

project_files.description: List of filenames that indicate a project root when found during upward directory search. See naming conventions specification.

use_project_config.description: Whether to search for and merge project-level .clearhead/config.json files
